snippet: Relais & Châteaux, a network of more than 500 luxury hotels and restaurants around the world, will host its second annual Grands Chefs Dinner on April 16 at Gotham Hall in New York City.
abstract: Relais & Châteaux, a network of more than 500 luxury hotels and restaurants around the world, will host its second annual Grands Chefs Dinner on April 16 at Gotham Hall in New York City.
